p: Among the main components, thymol proved to be the most effective in its contact toxicity activity, with a LD 50 value of 41.79 µg/adult. As shown in Figure 2, thymol had a positive dose-contact mortality response to SHBs with concentration. However, the other two, γ-terpinene and p-cymene, were less effective and achieved only LD 50 values of 424.02 and 1208.71 µg/adult, respectively.
